summary: An Ordinance providing for the improvement of East 75th Street, from 12th Avenue Northeast to 15th Avenue Northeast and 14th Avenue north line of Sandall's Addition all in accordance with Petition No. 80160 to the City Council of the City of Seattle, creating a local improvement district therefor, and providing that payment of said improvement be made by special assessments upon property in said district payable by mode of "Payment by Bonds".
